comment.author: 32990371@N05
comment._content: I believe this is taken facing WSW from the corner of Bernard Terrace and St Leonard's Street - the spire in the distance is possible St Paul's on Lutton Place, and the building with railings Nelson Hall (compare the upper corner of the roof lintel and overhang) edinburghssp.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/nelsonhall.jpg
